game.user

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.user.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of class Player. Moved from C++ to Java
    Version:
    1.1, 02.03.2021
    Author:
    Carlos Granados

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Create a void player, with ID = 0
      Player(int i)
      Create a player with the given ID, and it assumes a Hex board of size 5
      Player(int i, int b_size)
      Create a player with the given ID, and a Hex board of size b_size

        hb - HexBoard, the board where the match is played

      • set_pos

        public void set_pos(int i,
                    int j,
                    HexBoard hb)
        Function to set a played position in a given hex board
        Parameters:
        i - int, the row of the move made by player
        j - int, the col of the move made by player
        hb - HexBoard, the board where the match is played

      • set_coords

        public boolean set_coords(HexBoard hb,
                          Player other_player)
        Function to read from the screen the next move for current player. If valid, save the move. If not, ask again for the coordinates. If (-1, -1) is given, false is return, and the game is finished.
        Parameters:
        hb - HexBoard, the board where the match is played
        other_player - Player, the other player in the game
        Returns:
        true<\code> when valid coordinates were given

      • valid_move

        public boolean valid_move(CoordBoard move,
                          Player other_player)
        Check if the new move is valid (not played before for any player)
        Parameters:
        move - CoordBoard, the move made by player
        other_player - Player, the other player in the game
        Returns:
        true<\code> when a move is valid (inside the board and not played by any of the players). false<\code> otherwise.

      • played

        public boolean played(CoordBoard move)
        Check if the current player already played the given move
        Parameters:
        move - CoordBoard, the move made by player
        Returns:
        true<\code> if the current player already played the given move. false<\code> otherwise.

      • player_won

        public boolean player_won(HexBoard hb)
        Function to determine if the current player had complete the game (won): Complete path N-S or W-E
        Parameters:
        hb - HexBoard, the board where the match is played
        Returns:
        true<\code> if the current player has a complete path (i.e. if it has won the match). false<\code> otherwise
